measured_by: MacArthur Scale of Subjective Socioeconomic Status
justification: Participants completed a measure of subjective socioeconomic status (the MacArthur Scale of Subjective Socioeconomic Status; Adler et al., 2000).
Before the task, participants filled in the Perth Emotion Regulation Competency Inventory (PERCI; Preece et al., 2018).
Every 3â€“5 trials participants reported their current subjective affect using an Affective Slider (Betella & Verschure, 2016).
